name: kohlrabi
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of vegetable that is a member of the cabbage family. It has a pale green, thick, round stem, similar to a turnip in shape, that can be eaten.
chengyuzheng/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
